title: When do ranked stats get reset? ..or do they even?
body:
I was curious about when or even if my ranked stats will be reset, that is position and LP points. I remember last year I only just finished my promos when everything was reset and I had to do them all over again. Is that going to happen this time? or does it only happen in certain circumstances?   
Thanks for your help :)

replies.body: next season. So mid January or so.
